entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 23 April 2023
